about.title: About
about.appTagline: Smart medkit for the whole family
about.description: Smart Aid Kit is a modern app for managing medicines and health for the whole family. Track expiry dates, create medication reminders, maintain health history and manage your family's medicine cabinet. The app helps you never miss a dose, warns about expired medications and tracks important health indicators.
about.feature2: Package scanning for automatic medicine recognition
about.feature3: Health tracker for monitoring indicators (blood pressure, pulse, temperature, etc.)
about.feature4: Family member profile management with individual settings
about.feature5: Smart notifications for expiry dates and refill reminders
about.contactText: If you have questions, suggestions or found a bug, contact us:

help.title: Help & Support
help.contactText: If you have questions or suggestions, write to us:

faq1.question: How to add medicine?
faq1.answer: Go to the 'Home' tab and click 'Add Medicine'. You can add medicine manually or scan the package.

faq2.question: How to create a reminder?
faq2.answer: Open the medicine and click 'Add Reminder'. Set the time and days of the week for taking.

faq3.question: How to sync data?
faq3.answer: Data syncs automatically when connected to the internet. You can also perform manual sync in settings.

faq4.question: How to add a family member?
faq4.answer: Go to the 'Family' tab and click 'Add'. Fill in the family member information.

faq5.question: How does the prescription scanner work?
faq5.answer: Click 'Prescription Scanner' on the home screen, take a photo of the prescription. The app will automatically recognize medicines and add them to the medicine cabinet.

share.title: Share App
share.message: Try Smart Aid Kit - a smart medicine cabinet for the whole family! Manage medicines, track health and never forget to take medications.
share.description: Share the app with friends and family
